li.label: bathed in blighted sludge
li.description: I took a bath in blighted sludge. It wasn't that bad... as long as you ignore the foul stench... and the bones... and whatever that was that touched my leg...

li.label: bathed in sulphuric water
li.description: I took a relaxing bath in a sulphur pool. I don't smell great, but I do feel rejuvenated!
